description: William Shakespeare was born in Stratford-upon-Avon in 1564. He spent his early years in this market town in England and later returned to live there towards the end of his life. Stratford-upon-Avon is known for being Shakespeare's birthplace and home to many landmarks associated with his life.

Shakespeare spent a significant portion of his career in London, where he established himself as a successful playwright and actor. He was closely associated with the Globe Theatre and the theatrical scene in London during the Elizabethan and Jacobean eras.
